page.title: 13RECREATION IN FORFAR
page.content: {Recreation}One of the most fascinating features of Forfar is the{Leisure} {Centre.}It was opened on 22nd March 1975.It has an upstairs games room where pool and table tennis are played.The changing rooms have lockers in the men's and women's and they both have 2 changing rooms each.The Centre also has a polygym where people go to exercise especially in the winter. The main hall is used for team games like basketball,netball,football and also for badminton, archery and carpet bowls.It also has a trampoline club with about 60 in it so far.There are two purpose-built squash courts.The drama studio has lots of uses:plays are acted there, gymnastics and table tennis also.It is sometimes set out for karate.There is a climbing tower that has 6 climbing routes for practising foot and hand holds.
